PtSituationElement.Summary: Until further notice B38/B38 LTD buses are detoured between DeKalb Ave at St Nicholas Ave and Seneca Ave at Gates Ave because of construction    Eastbound
PtSituationElement.Description: Until further notice B38/B38 LTD buses are detoured between DeKalb Ave at St Nicholas Ave and Seneca Ave at Gates Ave because of construction   Eastbound buses will make stops along St Nicholas Ave from DeKalb Ave to Gates Ave.  Westbound buses will make stops along Cypress Ave from Gates Ave to DeKalb Ave.  Eastbound missed stops: DeKalb Ave at St Nicholas Ave DeKalb Ave at Seneca Ave Seneca Ave at Stockholm St Seneca Ave at Bleecker St  Westbound missed stops: Seneca Ave at Bleecker St Seneca Ave at DeKalb Ave  Reminder: B38 LTD buses do not operate overnight, weekends or July 5
